Package texasholdem

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    HoldemUI
    Provides the methods needed by the HoldemManager to interact with the user interface.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Card
    Each Card object represents a playing card from a standard card deck.
    CardNumComparator<T>
    A Comparator that will put Card objects in order by value, with ace high.
    CardSuitComparator<T>
    A Comparator that will put Card sets in order by suit.
    Deck
    Represents a deck of 52 cards.
    FinalHandChecker
    FinalHandChecker has methods for evaluating cards and hands in texas holdem poker.
    HandAnalyzer
    This class is the brains of the computer players in a texas holdem poker game.
    HoldemLauncher
    Contains the main method for launching the game.
    HoldemManager
    This class controls the entire poker game.
    Player
    This class represents a poker player.
    PlayerPanel
    Each PlayerPanel represents 1 player in the poker GUI.
    PokerTools
    This class contains static values used in a Texas Holdem poker game.
    StartDialog
    This is the dialog that comes up at the beginning of the game for selection of number of players and entering name.
    TexasHoldemFrame
    This is the main frame for the user interface.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Hand
    These values represent poker hands.
    Name
    Provides a list of names for naming computer players.
    Number
    The Number enumeration represents the 13 possible values present in a deck of cards.
    PartialHand
    These values represent incomplete hands in Texas holdem that still have some betting value.
    Phase
    Represents the stages of a Texas Holdem game.
    Suit
    The Suit enumeration represents the 4 suits present in a deck of cards.
